decisions.decision: Next.js 14 App Router + Supabase + Stripe + Tailwind
decisions.rationale: Modern stack with great DX, free tiers, and strong community support

decisions.decision: React Context + useReducer for global state, no external libraries
decisions.rationale: Simpler, no extra dependencies, sufficient for rental marketplace scale

decisions.decision: Apple-inspired dark theme with ASHIKA brand color overrides
decisions.rationale: Premium feel for luxury rental marketplace, reusing proven patterns
Built-in auth, real-time, free tier generous, RLS for security

decisions.decision: 7-day rental window (3 days before event, event day, 3 days return buffer)
decisions.rationale: Balances customer flexibility with inventory availability

decisions.decision: $100 pre-authorized hold, released on successful return
decisions.rationale: Standard industry practice, protects against damage without upfront charge

decisions.decision: Stage-by-stage build with mock data first, API integration last
decisions.rationale: Allows full UI/UX development without API key dependencies
